title: 15 Best Sellers Our Readers Bought To Treat Themselves In February
description: February is a time of year when our online shopping habits reflect a strong appetite for both a good bargain and the desire to indulge in a little self-care. First, there were plenty of President's Day deals to take advantage of, from Nordstrom’s winter sale to major savings on mattresses. We also carted small luxuries to treat ourselves, such as cute Valentine’s Day lingerie. Another shopping trend that ended the month? The White Lotus collaborations that made us feel vacation-ready, ahead of the HBO hit show’s third season release.The anonymous data from our shopping stories reveals that our savvy readers have also been making the most of these February deals. From chic date night outfits to discounted boots to pampering lip treatments, the products topping your lists were all about adding a bit of joy to the start of spring.Ahead, we're sharing the February best sellers our readers couldn't resist adding to their carts. Whether you're in the market for something special or just curious about what everyone else is buying, consider this your curated guide to February's standout finds.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Banana Republic Denim Scoop-Neck Midi DressThis denim dress proves that a comfortable corset dress really does exist. The stretch denim fabric material and princess seams create a fit-and-flare silhouette that hugs without feeling restrictive. Whether you're dressing it down with sneakers or elevating it with slingbacks for a dinner date, this versatile piece works overtime in your wardrobe.Banana Republic Denim Scoop-Neck Midi Dress, $, available at Banana RepublicLawless Forget The Filler FoundationOur beauty editors have been raving about Lawless’ new matte foundation, which strikes the perfect balance between a hydrating skin tint and full-coverage foundation, delivering a natural, cloud-like finish that melts right into the skin without settling into any dry patches. The formula is packed with Maxi-Youth™ complex, a type of hyaluronic acid that improves your skin's elasticity over time.Lawless Forget The Filler Skin-Plumping Line-Smoothing Foundati, $, available at LawlessGeorge Oliver Upholstered Solid Wood Dining Chair SetWe know a good Wayfair furniture deal when we see one. These chairs feature a sleek and sophisticated design that will look good with any dining room setting, and the solid wood frame means you’ll be getting years of use out of it. And at over half off? This is a no-brainer purchase.George Oliver Upholstered Solid Wood Dining Chair Set, $, available at WayfairLululemon Smooth Fit Pull-On High-Rise PantThis Lululemon bestseller has quickly become a reader favorite, both for the comfy fabric that comfortably skims the contours of the body and an understated design that looks work appropriate. The item has just landed in the We Made Too Much section, but we predict the deal would be around for much longer.Lululemon Smooth Fit Pull-On High-Rise Pant Regular, $, available at LululemonFree People Nocturnal Solid CardiPutting together a transitional weather outfit is never that straightforward, but this relaxed-fit cardigan is the kind of staple that you’ll get plenty of wear no matter the season. Made from a cozy wool-cashmere blend, it’s perfect for year-round layering (especially for when it suddenly gets chilly). You might end up collecting multiple colorways, like our readers already have done.Free People Nocturnal Solid Cardi, $, available at Free PeopleSolawave 4-in-1 Skincare WandOur editors nominated this powerhouse beauty tool for an MVP Award and it’s not hard to see why: it combines red light therapy, galvanic current, facial massage, and therapeutic warmth to deliver smoother, brighter skin while reducing puffiness. The compact, travel-friendly design is the cherry on top.Solawave 4-in-1 Radiant Renewal Skincare Wand, $, available at SolawaveAnn Taylor Petite Double Breasted Dolman Sleeve CoatAnn Taylor’s rebrand to more playful (yet equal parts sophisticated and wearable) styles has been fascinating to witness. Exhibit A: This black petite coat. The tailored silhouette looks great on shorter frames without drowning them, while the roomy dolman sleeves allow for layering chunky sweaters underneath. At 60% off, this jacket is a total steal — especially considering you won't need to factor in alteration costs.Ann Taylor Petite Double Breasted Dolman Sleeve Coat, $, available at Ann TaylorDr. Idriss Barrier Baste Lip Basting DuoIf you're tired of waking up to chapped lips, this new Dr. Idriss lip basting kit will be music to your ears. The two-step system includes a no-rinse mandelic acid lip peel, which gently exfoliates dead skin, while a ceramides-rich baste locks in the moisture. It’s also a great way to rehydrate your lips after wearing a particularly drying lipstick.Dr. Idriss Barrier Baste Lip Duo, $, available at Dr. IdrissAbercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Low Rise Baggy JeanCow print has been tapped as an emerging trend for spring, and we absolutely love it on A&F’s bestselling baggy (but never too slouchy) jean silhouette. We guarantee that everyone will be asking where you got these jeans, whether you're pairing them with a simple white tee or going matchy-matchy with a cow print jacket.Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Low Rise Baggy Jean, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchQuince Italian Leather Trapeze CrossbodyYou don't need to drop serious cash for a handbag that looks and feels luxurious. Case in point: this genuine Italian leather top-handle bag by Quince, which is both lightweight and surprisingly roomy. The architectural trapeze shape gives this a designer label edge, and we love that it can be worn without the straps as a micro shoulder bag.Quince Italian Leather Trapeze Crossbody, $, available at QuinceSunday Citizen Snug Stitch ComforterWe’ve previously raved about how impossibly snuggly Sunday Citizen comforters are, and it looks like our readers have taken a particular liking to the sage colorway. The viscose fabric retains warmth while maintaining cool and breathable, to keep your body just the right amount of toasty at all times. Just be warned: You’ll never want to get out of bed.Sunday Citizen Snug Stitch Comforter, $, available at Sunday CitizenDolce Vita Auggie Pointed Toe Knee High Boot The versatile styling appeal of a pair of black knee-high boots cannot be understated. This pointed-toe pair will look chic with your winter dresses, and we appreciate the wide-calf sizing. The kitten heels make them comfortable enough to be worn all day.Dolce Vita Auggie Pointed Toe Knee High Boot, $, available at NordstromZara Combination 100% Suede Leather JacketWe just can’t get enough of suede leather clothing: they add a fabulous, '70s-inspired flair to your outfit and only gets better with age. This Zara number has the look of a vintage find without the wear-and-tear, thanks to retro-inspired details like cold-tone buttons and a contrast trim collar.Zara Combination 100% Suede Leather Jacket With Pleat, $, available at ZaraTypebea The Daily Growth KitOur beauty director Jacqueline Kilikita tested Typebea’s hair growth products for a month and was beyond impressed by how much fuller and silkier her hair looked, winning her non-stop compliments (everyone at R29’s London office can confirm this). Rich in follicle strengthening peptides, the collection — featuring a scalp serum, shampoo, and conditioner — is a must-try for anyone worried about hair loss.Typebea The Daily Growth Kit, $, available at TypebeaThe White Lotus x H&M Ruffled Chiffon Strappy DressThese The White Lotus collabs just keep coming and we’re not mad about it. This strappy chiffon dress from H&M’s collection with the show’s costume designer is your ticket to channeling the glamorous wardrobe of this season’s main characters. The ruffles design is sophisticated yet flirty, and we can totally picture Chelsea (played by the brilliant Aimee Lou Wood) wearing this at fireside dinners.The White Lotus x H&M Ruffled Chiffon Strappy Dress, $, available at H&MLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?This Weekend's Best Sales, According To UsThe Best Deals From Ulta's 21 Days Of Beauty Sale42 Nordstrom Winter Sale Deals (We Don't Gatekeep)
author: Venus Wong
excerpt: The bestselling products our readers loved in February 2025, from snuggly comforters to sleek outerwear for spring.
text: 1 of 15Banana Republic Denim Scoop-Neck Midi DressThis denim dress proves that a comfortable corset dress really does exist. The stretch denim fabric material and princess seams create a fit-and-flare silhouette that hugs without feeling restrictive. We guarantee that everyone will be asking where you got these jeans, whether you're pairing them with a simple white tee or going matchy-matchy with a cow print jacket.10 of 15Quince Italian Leather Trapeze CrossbodyYou don't need to drop serious cash for a handbag that looks and feels luxurious. This strappy chiffon dress from H&M’s collection with the show’s costume designer is your ticket to channeling the glamorous wardrobe of this season’s main characters. html:
1 of 15

Banana Republic Denim Scoop-Neck Midi Dress

This denim dress proves that a comfortable corset dress really does exist. The stretch denim fabric material and princess seams create a fit-and-flare silhouette that hugs without feeling restrictive. Whether you're dressing it down with sneakers or elevating it with slingbacks for a dinner date, this versatile piece works overtime in your wardrobe.

2 of 15

Lawless Forget The Filler Foundation

Our beauty editors have been raving about Lawless’ new matte foundation, which strikes the perfect balance between a hydrating skin tint and full-coverage foundation, delivering a natural, cloud-like finish that melts right into the skin without settling into any dry patches. The formula is packed with Maxi-Youth™ complex, a type of hyaluronic acid that improves your skin's elasticity over time.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 15

George Oliver Upholstered Solid Wood Dining Chair Set

We know a good Wayfair furniture deal when we see one. These chairs feature a sleek and sophisticated design that will look good with any dining room setting, and the solid wood frame means you’ll be getting years of use out of it. And at over half off? This is a no-brainer purchase.

4 of 15

Lululemon Smooth Fit Pull-On High-Rise Pant

This Lululemon bestseller has quickly become a reader favorite, both for the comfy fabric that comfortably skims the contours of the body and an understated design that looks work appropriate. The item has just landed in the We Made Too Much section, but we predict the deal would be around for much longer.

5 of 15

Free People Nocturnal Solid Cardi

Putting together a transitional weather outfit is never that straightforward, but this relaxed-fit cardigan is the kind of staple that you’ll get plenty of wear no matter the season. Made from a cozy wool-cashmere blend, it’s perfect for year-round layering (especially for when it suddenly gets chilly). You might end up collecting multiple colorways, like our readers already have done.

6 of 15

Solawave 4-in-1 Skincare Wand

Our editors nominated this powerhouse beauty tool for an MVP Award and it’s not hard to see why: it combines red light therapy, galvanic current, facial massage, and therapeutic warmth to deliver smoother, brighter skin while reducing puffiness. The compact, travel-friendly design is the cherry on top.

7 of 15

Ann Taylor Petite Double Breasted Dolman Sleeve Coat

Ann Taylor’s rebrand to more playful (yet equal parts sophisticated and wearable) styles has been fascinating to witness. Exhibit A: This black petite coat. The tailored silhouette looks great on shorter frames without drowning them, while the roomy dolman sleeves allow for layering chunky sweaters underneath. At 60% off, this jacket is a total steal — especially considering you won't need to factor in alteration costs.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 15

Dr. Idriss Barrier Baste Lip Basting Duo

If you're tired of waking up to chapped lips, this new Dr. Idriss lip basting kit will be music to your ears. The two-step system includes a no-rinse mandelic acid lip peel, which gently exfoliates dead skin, while a ceramides-rich baste locks in the moisture. It’s also a great way to rehydrate your lips after wearing a particularly drying lipstick.

9 of 15

Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Low Rise Baggy Jean

Cow print has been tapped as an emerging trend for spring, and we absolutely love it on A&F’s bestselling baggy (but never too slouchy) jean silhouette. We guarantee that everyone will be asking where you got these jeans, whether you're pairing them with a simple white tee or going matchy-matchy with a cow print jacket.

10 of 15

Quince Italian Leather Trapeze Crossbody

You don't need to drop serious cash for a handbag that looks and feels luxurious. Case in point: this genuine Italian leather top-handle bag by Quince, which is both lightweight and surprisingly roomy. The architectural trapeze shape gives this a designer label edge, and we love that it can be worn without the straps as a micro shoulder bag.

11 of 15

Sunday Citizen Snug Stitch Comforter

We’ve previously raved about how impossibly snuggly Sunday Citizen comforters are, and it looks like our readers have taken a particular liking to the sage colorway. The viscose fabric retains warmth while maintaining cool and breathable, to keep your body just the right amount of toasty at all times. Just be warned: You’ll never want to get out of bed.

12 of 15

Dolce Vita Auggie Pointed Toe Knee High Boot

The versatile styling appeal of a pair of black knee-high boots cannot be understated. This pointed-toe pair will look chic with your winter dresses, and we appreciate the wide-calf sizing. The kitten heels make them comfortable enough to be worn all day.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 15

Zara Combination 100% Suede Leather Jacket

We just can’t get enough of suede leather clothing: they add a fabulous, '70s-inspired flair to your outfit and only gets better with age. This Zara number has the look of a vintage find without the wear-and-tear, thanks to retro-inspired details like cold-tone buttons and a contrast trim collar.

14 of 15

Typebea The Daily Growth Kit

Our beauty director Jacqueline Kilikita tested Typebea’s hair growth products for a month and was beyond impressed by how much fuller and silkier her hair looked, winning her non-stop compliments (everyone at R29’s London office can confirm this). Rich in follicle strengthening peptides, the collection — featuring a scalp serum, shampoo, and conditioner — is a must-try for anyone worried about hair loss.

15 of 15

The White Lotus x H&M Ruffled Chiffon Strappy Dress

These The White Lotus collabs just keep coming and we’re not mad about it. This strappy chiffon dress from H&M’s collection with the show’s costume designer is your ticket to channeling the glamorous wardrobe of this season’s main characters. The ruffles design is sophisticated yet flirty, and we can totally picture Chelsea (played by the brilliant Aimee Lou Wood) wearing this at fireside dinners.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT
